title: Forge the Memes
description:
The Zestaphoni Ferroalloy Plant, a metallurgical factory that was established in 1933 during the Soviet era, is located in the country of Georgia and has been in operation 24/7 ever since. The plant's heating furnaces need to remain active at all times, necessitating continuous monitoring by the workers. Some of the employees have been working at the company 'GM' (Georgian Manganese) for over 40 years, observing firsthand the evolution of industrial society as they help create the alloys that power it.  
  
Koopmans traveled to Georgia with a camera and captured this forging of the memes.       
  
Meme: 1  
Season: 3  
Card: 1

openSea.description:
The Memes Collection is focused on the fight for the open metaverse (decentralization, community, self-sovereignty) and spreading this message to many people, many wallets.

It is a collection that is meant to be open and accessible. Edition sizes will generally be large and inexpensive, to spread the word and to avoid gas wars.

We will try to have a good time along the way, make some fun art, do great collabs and just generally have a good time.

For more information visit https://6529.io/collections/the-memes/
